articles.author: By Marnie Hunter, CNN
articles.title: Pre-travel testing requirement lifted: What you need to know about the new US travel policy - CNN
articles.description: Many travelers in the United States and abroad have been waiting for it. The travel industry has been pushing for it. And on Sunday an end arrives to the requirement for travelers to test negative for Covid-19 before entering the US.
articles.content: CNN's Elizabeth Cohen and Kaitlan Collins contributed to this report.Top image: Madrid-Barajas Airport (Emilio Parra Doiztua/Bloomberg/Getty Images)
